headline: Assessing Tyson Foods (TSN) Valuation As Earnings And Margin Pressures Persist
summary: Why Tyson Foods (TSN) Is Back in Focus Recent analysis of Tyson Foods (TSN) has drawn attention to flat revenue, weaker gross margins versus competitors, and a 22.1% annual drop in earnings per share, raising fresh questions about its current business footing. See our latest analysis for Tyson Foods. The recent 14.46% 90-day share price return, alongside an 11.66% 1-year total shareholder return, suggests improving momentum as the market reassesses Tyson Foods' earnings pressures and margin...
